title: The Originals Basics
description: Test your knowledge of the Mikaelson family saga!

questions.question: Where does The Originals primarily take place?
questions.explanation: The Originals is set in New Orleans, where the Mikaelsons originally helped build the city centuries ago.

questions.question: The Originals is a spinoff of The Vampire Diaries.
questions.explanation: The Originals premiered in 2013 as a spinoff focusing on the Original vampire family introduced in TVD.

questions.question: How many seasons did The Originals run for?
questions.explanation: The Originals ran for 5 seasons from 2013 to 2018.

questions.question: What is the name of Klaus's daughter?
questions.explanation: Hope Mikaelson is Klaus's daughter with Hayley Marshall, and the first tribrid ever born.

questions.question: What phrase represents the Mikaelson family motto?
questions.explanation: 'Always and Forever' is the Mikaelson family vow, representing their eternal commitment to each other.

questions.question: Marcel Gerard was raised by the Mikaelsons.
questions.explanation: Klaus rescued Marcel as a child slave and raised him, later turning him into a vampire.

questions.question: Who is the main antagonist in Season 1?
questions.explanation: Marcel rules New Orleans when the Mikaelsons return, setting up a power struggle with Klaus.

questions.question: What supernatural council governs New Orleans?
questions.explanation: The Faction was a council of human leaders, witches, werewolves, and vampires who governed New Orleans.
